name: The Care Registry
tag_list: senior-care, elder-care, geriatric-care, home-care, at-home, nurse-aides
overview:
The Care Registry’s nurse aides and companions provide quality in-home senior care services and non-medical home health care and companion services to senior citizens and adults.

Senior Care Consultants can work with you and your family to help you maintain your independent lifestyle. We will meet with you in your home to help evaluate your situation, listen to your goals and needs, and develop a plan of care for you.

For nearly 20 years The Care Registry has brought a full-range of senior care services to the Pittsburgh, PA area, including hourly in-home care, 24-hour live-in care, and disability care. Our care-givers, companions, and nurse aides are experienced, capable, and caring individuals.

Your independence is important to us, and we want to make sure you, or your loved one, receives the best home care possible while maintaining your dignity and autonomy.
